title: The Candy Man Can... and Did
description:
Thought buried treasure was the stuff of movies? Think again! Nikki and Mr. Malone venture out on some real-life treasure hunts in this adventurous episode.

Follow Mr. Malone on Twitter and Instagram

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

--
